title: Braveland Pirate (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_braveland_pirate_2.0.0.3.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: BRAVELAND PIRATE
Genre: Strategy - Turn-based - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.8.0+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17)
Languages: Audio and text: English, Ñ€ÑƒÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹
Modes: Single-player
Released: September 15, 2015
Size: 362.1 MB
Company: Tortuga Team / Tortuga Team
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/braveland_pirate

About:
The Braveland trilogy concludes with the most exciting book of all, number three - welcome to Braveland Pirate strategy game! A crew of pirates led by Captain Jim embarks on a search for the Eternal Treasure. Hordes of undead, chests full of gold, devious pirate captains, and breathtaking adventures await you in the Free Islands.
Hand drawn tropical islands surrounded by a vast ocean
Travel freely between the islands on your own ship
Heaps of rare artifacts stashed away in treasure chests

Minimum system requirements - Windows: XP Service Pack 3 or later
Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core
Memory: 2 GB RAM
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive: 750 MB available space
